channel.title: Divine-Reality V5.7 ~ Achievements ~ Custom Bosses ~ 474
channel.description:
[CENTER][B] [IMG]http://divine-reality.net/images/logo.png[/img]
Hello, and welcome to Divine-reality's proper-advertisement thread
Since the beginning of my project with Divine-reality, I really haven't tried to advertise the server, that much due to my only want is to have a small player-base with a couple of loyal players who would report any issues to me so they could be resolved.
After around nearly 4 months of Beta, (We are still in beta, but we are closing the end of this) I am finally starting to kick up the campaign for advertisements, and getting the servers name out there.
Let's talk about our Position
The web-site is hosted on HostGator, with SiteLock and WhoIsProtection, at a high-end package to keep us steady.
The Server is hosted on a Dedicated server with 32GB of Ram We now have implemented Netty Networking Verison 5.0.1 Alpha!
Anyway, enough of the boring talk.. Let's get to the features of Divine-Reality..
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4xpqr39T9GU]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4xpqr39T9GU[/url]
[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=5][URL=http://divine-reality.net]Website[/URL] [URL=http://divine-reality.wikia.com/wiki/Divine_Reality_Wiki"Divine-Reality Wiki Page[/url] [URL=http://divine-reality.net/xen/highscores]Highscores Page[/url] [URL=http://divine-reality.net/xen/donate]Payment Page[/url] [/SIZE][/FONT] Brief-detail about the server[For quick n easy skim-read]
Recent stress test: [img]http://puu.sh/7ediR.png[/img]
We have 20 functional skills, all working with plans to exceed the 21 mark, and have functioning Hunter.
We offer a combat-prestige, with a quantity of 30 Prestige Ranks!
We offer a unique voting system, with a unique voting-shop to keep you interested and voting for us daily.
We have the ability to change your game-play ::525 and ::459 two completely different Game-frames to suit the preferences of the players.
Video: Please note the music was a joke :p [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EO4qKxuQUnU#t=25]Divine-reality Clanchat Update - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gMM6Bosl1ck]Divine-Reality - Cook's assistant quest guide [K] - YouTube[/url]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/k0rsc3.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5UOML.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5UOXH.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5UP3j.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5UP43.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/7WLkx.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7WLaD.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7WL8Y.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7WLaD.jpg[/img]
[Extra info]
[SPOIL]At Divine Reality we believe in the old saying "The customer is always right" The players being the customers. We actually take note of what our players are doing and saying, we actually look and reply to ALL suggestions.
If you're like us you're sick of joining an rsps only to be another "Sheep in the flock" or to find out that the owner just doesn't care. At Divine Reality we are passionate gamers, we believe a game should be played for fun and therefore we are always thinking of new ideas and content and running it past the community to see their thoughts. We have an excellent staff team that are there for the PLAYERS and will help in anyway they possibly can.
We also have logs on almost everything so if a player loses an item when they shouldn't have they can be refunded without the risk of players cheating the system.
We have many features at Divine Reality such as:
Projectile clipping. Npc clipping both in and out of combat. Player clipping. Obfuscated client to prevent cheat clients. Anti pk point farming system that still allows legit pkers to get points. Fully working clanchat with ranks and commands. Firecape animation. Decent drop rates, so your drops are worthwhile. Hard, medium and easy bosses. No overpowered weapons in the donation store. We are not a "pay to win" server. Bank pins. Sir, Lord and Legend game modes. Each with their own benefits. Skill points shop. Pure shop. Pking shop, both supply's and rewards.
Bosses:
Fully working GWD with minions and killcount. King black dragon. Barrelchest. Kalphite Queen. Daggonoth kings. Giant moles. Glod. (Requires a team to kill and a minigame to enter) Slash bash. Ape atoll dungeon. Brimhaven dungeon.
Fully working skills:
Runecrafting. Agility with multiple courses. Herblore with profit to be made. Theiving with rouges den and point shop. Fully working crafting. Fully working fletching. Fully working slayer. Mining with guild. Smithing. Fishing with guild. Cooking. Firemaking. Woodcutting. Farming with multiple patches and money to be made (Herblore). Hunter coming soon.
Join Divine Reality now and start your journey on the only server that truly cares about it's players and their opinions.
Website: [url=http://www.divine-reality.net]Divine-Reality Beta[/url] [/SPOIL]
[/B][/CENTER]

item.title: Divine-Reality V5.7 ~ Achievements ~ Custom Bosses ~ 474
item.dc:creator: @reality-divine reality-divine
item.description:
@reality-divine wrote:

[CENTER][B]

Hello, and welcome to Divine-reality’s proper-advertisement thread

Since the beginning of my project with Divine-reality, I really haven’t tried to advertise the server, that much due to my only want is to have a small player-base with a couple of loyal players who would report any issues to me so they could be resolved.

After around nearly 4 months of Beta, (We are still in beta, but we are closing the end of this) I am finally starting to kick up the campaign for advertisements, and getting the servers name out there.

Let’s talk about our Position

The web-site is hosted on HostGator, with SiteLock and WhoIsProtection, at a high-end package to keep us steady.

The Server is hosted on a Dedicated server with 32GB of Ram
We now have implemented Netty Networking Verison 5.0.1 Alpha!

Anyway, enough of the boring talk… Let’s get to the features of Divine-Reality…

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4xpqr39T9GU

[FONT=Georgia][SIZE=5][URL=http://divine-reality.net]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://divine-reality.wikia.com/wiki/Divine_Reality_Wiki"Divine-Reality Wiki Page[/url]
Highscores Page
Payment Page
[/SIZE][/FONT]
Brief-detail about the server[For quick n easy skim-read]

Recent stress test:

We have 20 functional skills, all working with plans to exceed the 21 mark, and have functioning Hunter.

We offer a combat-prestige, with a quantity of 30 Prestige Ranks!

We offer a unique voting system, with a unique voting-shop to keep you interested and voting for us daily.

We have the ability to change your game-play ::525 and ::459 two completely different Game-frames to suit the preferences of the players.

Video: Please note the music was a joke
Divine-reality Clanchat Update - YouTube
Divine-Reality - Cook’s assistant quest guide [K] - YouTube








[Extra info]

[SPOIL]At Divine Reality we believe in the old saying “The customer is always right” The players being the customers. We actually take note of what our players are doing and saying, we actually look and reply to ALL suggestions.

If you’re like us you’re sick of joining an rsps only to be another “Sheep in the flock” or to find out that the owner just doesn’t care.
At Divine Reality we are passionate gamers, we believe a game should be played for fun and therefore we are always thinking of new ideas and content and running it past the community to see their thoughts.
We have an excellent staff team that are there for the PLAYERS and will help in anyway they possibly can.

We also have logs on almost everything so if a player loses an item when they shouldn’t have they can be refunded without the risk of players cheating the system.

We have many features at Divine Reality such as:

Projectile clipping.
Npc clipping both in and out of combat.
Player clipping.
Obfuscated client to prevent cheat clients.
Anti pk point farming system that still allows legit pkers to get points.
Fully working clanchat with ranks and commands.
Firecape animation.
Decent drop rates, so your drops are worthwhile.
Hard, medium and easy bosses.
No overpowered weapons in the donation store. We are not a "pay to win" server.
Bank pins.
Sir, Lord and Legend game modes. Each with their own benefits.
Skill points shop.
Pure shop.
Pking shop, both supply's and rewards.

Bosses:

Fully working GWD with minions and killcount.
King black dragon.
Barrelchest.
Kalphite Queen.
Daggonoth kings.
Giant moles.
Glod. (Requires a team to kill and a minigame to enter)
Slash bash.
Ape atoll dungeon.
Brimhaven dungeon.

Fully working skills:

Runecrafting.
Agility with multiple courses.
Herblore with profit to be made.
Theiving with rouges den and point shop.
Fully working crafting.
Fully working fletching.
Fully working slayer.
Mining with guild.
Smithing.
Fishing with guild.
Cooking.
Firemaking.
Woodcutting.
Farming with multiple patches and money to be made (Herblore).
Hunter coming soon.

Join Divine Reality now and start your journey on the only server that truly cares about it’s players and their opinions.

Website:
Divine-Reality Beta
[/SPOIL]

[/B][/CENTER]
